Class Playground

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverSide.objects.Playground
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlaygroundInterface, java.rmi.Remote

    public class Playground
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlaygroundInterface
    Playground Shared Memory Region where the game takes place
